summary: Utility module for modeling sybil attack success probabilities. It translates burned or locked coin amounts into influence weights, converts weights back to coin values, and traverses a probability tree to compute the overall chance that top participants can compromise the system.
business_intent: Help security analysts and platform operators quantify the risk of sybil attacks in a blockchainâ€‘based network, allowing them to set appropriate economic barriers (coin burns or locks) and assess the robustness of the system.
